result.value:
Tests can be run as follows:

    python3 -m pytest -v --pyargs extra_data

In the source directory, you can also omit `--pyargs extra_data`.

*EXtra-data* is available on our Anaconda installation on the Maxwell cluster:

    module load exfel exfel_anaconda3

You can also install it [from PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/extra-data/)
to use in other environments with Python 3.6 or later:

    pip install extra_data

If you get a permissions error, add the `--user` flag to that command.

result.description:
## What's Changed

* Expand JUNGFRAU components to accept SCS_HRIXS_JUNGF and DET_LAB_JF by @kakhahmed in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/464
* Add release note for 1.15.1 by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/465


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/compare/1.15.0...1.15.1

## What's Changed

* Bump pyparsing from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/436
* Bump pyzmq from 25.1.0 to 25.1.1 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/437
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.8.0 to <2023.9.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/438
* Bump karabo-bridge from 0.6.2 to 0.7.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/439
* Bump pytz from 2023.3 to 2023.3.post1 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/443
* Update pandas requirement from <2.1.0 to <2.2.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/442
* Update numpy requirement from <1.26.0 to <1.27.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/444
* Bump msgpack from 1.0.5 to 1.0.6 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/445
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.9.0 to <2023.10.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/446
* Update msgpack requirement from <=1.0.6 to <=1.0.7 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/447
* Expose units symbol & name on KeyData objects by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/449
* Update h5py requirement from <3.10.0 to <3.11.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/450
* Update pillow requirement from <10.1.0 to <10.2.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/454
* Bump psutil from 5.9.5 to 5.9.6 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/452
* Bump cloudpickle from 2.2.1 to 3.0.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/453
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.10.0 to <2023.11.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/456
* Include XTDF sources in lsxfel when details are enabled by @philsmt in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/440
* Faster split_trains for long runs by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/459
* karabo-bridge-serve-run command by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/458
* Add release notes for EXtra-data 1.15 by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/pull/461


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-data/compare/1.14.0...1.15.0
